name: Victreebel
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: Acid that has dissolved many prey becomes sweeter, making it even more effective at attracting prey.

poke_body.name: Tangling Tendrils
poke_body.effect: As long as Victreebel is your Active Pokémon, your opponent’s Active Pokémon’s Retreat Cost is {C}{C} more.

attacks.name: Acidic Drain
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Poisoned. Remove 3 damage counters from Victreebel.
